attributes.review: i downloaded this app so i could see my dementia king 👑 once i opened the app i was asked to give my phone number and to give my address and email lmao😔 then i was immediately harassed and threatened to donate money to the cheetos campaign🤢i do not appreciate the rudeness and pressure to donate to a campaign for a racist, homophobic, transphobic, xenophobic, sexist, misogynistic, rapist. no thanks😜 0/10 for me😘
attributes.title: definitely a no from me🥰

attributes.review:
I WAS ON THE APP AND A PICTURE OF DONALD TRUMP CAME UP. MY DOG SAW IT AND STOPPED BREATHING. I TRIED TO GIVE IT CPR, BUT IT DIDNT WORK. THEN MY CAT CAME OVER AND SAW THE PICTURE OF DONALD AND STARTED THROWING UP THAT IT ENDED UP THROWING UP ITS OWN POOP!!! THE POOP TASTED SO BAD THAT MY CAT DIED!! I WAS IN SHOCK. I SCREAMED FOR HELP, SO MY MOM AND DAD CAME OVER. THEY SAW THE PICTURE, AND IMMEDIATELY STARTED RUNNING AWAY AND RAN INTO THE ROAD! A CAR HIT THEM AND NOW THEY ARE UNCONSCIOUS IN THEIR GRAVE BECAUSE THE PICTURE OF DONALD TRUMP WAS SO UGLY IT KILLED THEM. 

I DO  N O T  RECCOMEND
attributes.title: IT KILLED MY FAMILY 😡

attributes.review: I hate this app. Every time I open it I sh** bricks for whatever reason! It’s probably a ploy constructed by the Trump administration to build the wall so Trump gets re-elected. It may work. I mean that would be millions of bricks and it would make a VERY big wall. When people said that Trump was going to pull the budget for this wall thing out of his a** I didn’t think they meant literally! Our President is a genius!!! But this app still makes my booty bleed from all the bricks soooo 1/5 stars. Sorry that’s just how I feel.
attributes.title: Booty bricks

attributes.review: I don’t know why I expected a Cheeto to be able to make an app but I was disappointed none the less. Actually terrible, 0/10. I am definitely referring to the app and not my experience of living in America during the years 2016-2020. I would recommend moving to a different country before you download this app. Go download tik tok instead.
attributes.title: Honeslty trash
